app_name: Piano Pink 2019 for Lil Nas X - Old Town Road
app_detail:
Lil Nas X - Old Town Road

Tap tap and play your favorite piano music game!
Piano Pink 2019 for Lil Nas X - Old Town Road is one of the best girl games in 2019 which brings 800+ hottest piano songs to one right now on your phone.

Easy to play Piano Pink 2019 for Lil Nas X - Old Town Road 
â€¢ Piano Pink 2019 for Lil Nas X - Old Town Road is very easy to play. Tap on the piano tiles, do not tap the blank tiles. Hold the pink tiles from start to the end of tiles to make more score.
You will lose if you miss the piano tiles or tap on blank tiles. But you can continue play with watching a short ads.

Game Features:
ğŸµğŸµ nice themes: Piano Pink 2019 for Lil Nas X - Old Town Road is the one of best beautiful pink piano of 2019.
ğŸµğŸµ exciting piano game, easy to play: Lil Nas X - Old Town Road is the best awesome piano tiles games for you. Perform your favorite piano songs and impress your partners with your piano skill.
ğŸµğŸµ 900+ hot songs and classic songs. Feel the cute piano music melodies through every tap with perfect timing tiles.
ğŸµğŸµ Bonus mode : you can collect coins to unlock your favorite songs
ğŸµğŸµ Weekly chart of most favorite songs
ğŸµğŸµ Daily login bonus to get free coin
ğŸµğŸµ Spin wheel : test your luck with spin wheel and get surprise gift
ğŸµğŸµ You can play offline! But with internet connection, the game will update new songs for you
ğŸµğŸµ Save and play your favorite piano songs

Play this game right now and challenge your friends. This game is more relaxing than you think!!!

Permission: we would request â€œStorageâ€ permission to download new songs from server!!!

If you can not find your favorite songs in game. Please comment your song request and send to us. We will add as soon as possible.
